dialogue: Don't tell Dilbert I told you what he plans to do.
What if he asks me how I found out?
You have given me two bad choices.
If I don't change my plans based on this information, I'll have big problems.
But if I act on it, Dilbert will ask me how I knew, and that will turn me into a liar.
Yes, those are your only options.
Have you ever seen the view from the roof?
